casebody.data:
Janell GUERRA et al., Plaintiffs-Appellants, v. Preston H. SMITH et al, Defendants-Appellees. No. 71-2857 United States Court of Appeals, Fifth Circuit. April 10, 1973. Mario O bledo, Mexican American Legal Defense & Educational Fund, San Francisco, Cal., Pete Tijerina, San Antonio, Tex., Alan Exelrod, Michael Men-delson, San Francisco, Cal., for plaintiffs-appellants. Stephen D. Sugarman, Los Angeles, Cal., Arthur Gochman, San Antonio, Tex., for amicus curiae. Crawford C. Martin, Atty. Gen. of Tex.; Pat Bailey, Asst. Atty. Gen., Austin, Tex., for defendants-appellees.

Before GEWIN, AINSWORTH and SIMPSON, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM:

Affirmed. See San Antonio Independent School District v. Rodriguez, -U.S.-, 93 S.Ct. 1278, 36 L.Ed.2d 16, decided March 21, 1973.
